item.title: [JavaScript]Method definitions(js物件裡function縮寫)
item.author: malagege
item.description: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 var obj = { foo: function() { /* code */ }, bar: function() { /* code */ } }; 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 var obj = { foo() { /* code */ }, bar() { /* code */ } }; https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Functions/Method_definitions
